overview: Georgie is slowly suffocating in a loveless marriage to fishing tycoon Jim Buckridge. Handsome poacher Lu is an irresistible symbol of the excitement she craves. A passionate affair follows that reveals the dark secrets in Luâ€™s past and forces him to take flight into the blistering heat of the outback. Georgie follows, determined to find him and bring him back.
tagline: Lose yourself... Find yourself... In love.
title: Dirt Music
